description: When attempting to remove a socket connection, a compile/runtime error occurs due to a mismatch in the socket parameters. The socket parameters used to establish the connection do not match the parameters used to attempt to remove the socket connection, resulting in an error.
code:
# This program will remove items from a list

# Create a list
my_list = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

# Create a function to remove items from a list
def remove_item(list_in, item):

    #
